Title: A Survey of Named Entity Disambiguation in Entity Linking
Abstract: named entity disambiguation  ned  holds significant importance and application value in the field of natural language processing  nlp . with the development and application of large language model  llm  and multimodality scholars have conducted extensive their research on ned. this paper provides a summary of the current state of ned research discusses challenges and explores future development trends. it aims to offer insights for ned research by integrating various methods thus promoting further advancements in this field.
